$TSLA New accounting rules trim Tesla deficit and promise faster future revenues http://www.marketwatch.com/News/Story/Story.aspx?guid=852B970E-1BE5-11E8-A65A-51CF95583976&siteid=yhoof2&yptr=yahoo

links.title: New accounting rules trim Tesla deficit and promise faster future revenues
links.description: Tesla reduced its accumulated deficit, built up from years of chronic losses, by $520 million pretax at the start of 2018, according to its annual report, thanks to new revenue recognition accounting rules that also allow the electronic car maker to post revenue from leased cars much faster.
